name: Pranas Technologies
overview:
Pranas Technologies (P) Ltd, a unit of Pranas Group of Companies based out in Coimbatore, South India is a Web development and Software development firm offering a comprehensive range of services such as Software Development, Website Development, Website Designing, E-Commerce Application Development, Web Application Development, web Application Maintenance, Database Administration, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Graphic Designing / Multimedia and 2D, 3D Animation. We always developing and maintaining a long-term satisfactory relationship with our clients that prove our service set a Benchmark Quality.

To Maximize the Clients ROI (Return on Investment) on IT, we are confided about to invest in our resources such as hardware and software infrastructure, communication and human resources.

Started in 2008, we are one of the leading IT firm offering a wide range of services and solutions to all kind of industries such as hospital, retail, manufacturing, education, travel, service - oriented and many more. We are anticipating our next level of growth through our product development, dedicated professionals and through strategic acquisitions. All these help you to realize the whole power of IT to drive your business a successful one.

Our aim is “to provide cost effective Designing and Development services and achieve mutual growth for our clients, employees, vendors and the organization at large”.
